Uses of Interface
org.restsql.core.ColumnMetaData

  • Packages that use ColumnMetaData 
    Package Description
    org.restsql.core
    Contains core framework interfaces, an API for deployments that use restSQL as a library, rather than an HTTP service.
    org.restsql.core.sqlresource
    Contains classes that model the SQL Resource definition XML document.

    • Uses of ColumnMetaData in org.restsql.core

      Methods in org.restsql.core that return types with arguments of type ColumnMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ColumnMetaData> SqlResourceMetaData.getAllReadColumns() 
      List<ColumnMetaData> SqlResourceMetaData.getChildReadColumns() 
      Map<String,ColumnMetaData> TableMetaData.getColumns()
      Returns map of column meta data, keyed by the column label (the alias if provided, otherwise the name).
      List<ColumnMetaData> SqlResourceMetaData.getParentReadColumns() 
      List<ColumnMetaData> TableMetaData.getPrimaryKeys()
      Returns ordered list of columns that are primary keys.

    • Uses of ColumnMetaData in org.restsql.core.sqlresource

      Methods in org.restsql.core.sqlresource with parameters of type ColumnMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Table SqlResourceDefinitionUtils.getTable(SqlResourceDefinition definition, ColumnMetaData column)
      Returns table with specified qualfied name.
